articles.description: Yashika Aannand who was involved in a gruesome accident that killed her best friend Valisetty Bhavani is still undergoing treatment though she is shifted from the ICU to a normal ward.

articles.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi 11: Divyanka Tripathi reacts to being called ‘cunningly smart’ over comments on Sourabh Raaj Jain - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Divyanka Tripathi was criticised for her comments on Sourabh Raaj Jain after he was nominated for the elimination stunt in Sunday’s episode of Khatron Ke Khiladi 11 by Arjun Bijlani. In her confessional, she appeared to support Arjun’s decision.
articles.content: Divyanka Tripathi offered a clarification after being called cunningly smart for her comments on Sourabh Raaj Jain in Khatron Ke Khiladi 11. During Sundays episode, Sourabh was eliminated after being… [+1834 chars]

articles.description: From her bubble bath to time in the pool: Surbhi Chandna's sneak peek into her vacay will leave you green with envy Also get bollywood actors, actress, movie, parties & event photos at Bollywoodlife.com
articles.content: It seems Surbhi Chandna is making the most of her Maldives vacay. She recently took to Instagram to share a video of her villa. Here are some snapshots the actress having a ball.

articles.title: Jodha Akbar actor Lokendra Singh loses a leg due to high diabetes level - Zee News
articles.description: Jodha Akbar and Yeh Hai Mohabbatein actor Lokendra Singh Rajawat had to get one of his legs below the knee amputated due to high blood sugar levels.
articles.content: New Delhi: Jodha Akbar and Yeh Hai Mohabbatein actor Lokendra Singh Rajawat had to get one of his legs below the knee amputated due to high blood sugar levels. The actor has been facing financial woe… [+1413 chars]

articles.description: Kiara Advani dropped her new photos in a chic white outfit on social media. The actress looks breath-taking and we can’t take our eyes off her.
